User Name: If you wish to manage Magento packages through the web admin interface, you will need to have web writeable permissions applied to all Magento folders and files.

User Name: If you are running PHP as CGI, your PHP processes may run under the same user as the user you used when uploading Magento files.

User Name: In other cases you will need to make Magento files writeable for the user that the web server process is running under.
